panels.description: Average latency in microseconds for the WAFL filesystem to process all the operations on the volume; not including request processing or network communication time.
panels.title: Volume Average Latency

panels.description: Average RDMA write I/O latency.
panels.title: FCVI Write Latency

panels.description: RDMA write throughput in bytes per second.
panels.title: FCVI Write Throughput

panels.description: Number of RDMA write I/Os issued per second.
panels.title: FCVI Write IOPs

panels.description: Average processor utilization across all processors in the system.
panels.title: Average CPU Utilization

panels.description: The utilization percent of the disk. aggr_disk_max_busy is the maximum of [disk_busy](#disk_busy) for label `aggr`.
panels.title: Max Disk Utilization Per Aggregate

panels.description: Average RDMA write I/O latency per node.
panels.title: Write Latency

panels.description: Average RDMA write throughput in bytes per second per node.
panels.title: Write Throughput

panels.description: Average Number of RDMA write I/Os issued per second per node.
panels.title: Write IOPs

panels.description: Total Number of times hard reset of FCVI adapter got issued per node.
panels.title: Hard Reset Count

panels.description: Total Number of times soft reset of FCVI adapter got issued per node.
panels.title: Soft  Reset Count

panels.description: Total Number of times Firmware reported link failure count per node.
panels.title: Link Failure Count

panels.description: Total Number of times Firmware reported loss of signal count per node.
panels.title: Loss of Signal Count

panels.description: Total Number of times Firmware reported loss of sync count per node.
panels.title: Loss of Sync Count

panels.description: Total Number of times Firmware reported SyStatDiscardFrames value per node.
panels.title: SyStatDiscardFrames Value

panels.description: Total Number of times Firmware reported invalid crc count per node.
panels.title: Invalid CRC Count

panels.description: Total Number of times Firmware reported invalid transmit word count per node.
panels.title: Invalid Transmit Word Count

panels.description: Average Number of RDMA I/Os issued per node.
panels.title: IOPs

panels.description: Average Number of RDMA read I/Os issued per node.
panels.title: Read IOPs

panels.description: Average Number of RDMA write I/Os issued per node.
panels.title: Write IOPs

panels.description: Average RDMA I/O latency per node.
panels.title: Average Latency

panels.description: The utilization percent of the disk. plex_disk_busy is disk_busy aggregated by plex.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Plexes by Disk Utilization

panels.description: The utilization percent of the disk. plex_disk_busy is disk_busy aggregated by plex.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Plexes by Disk Utilization

panels.description: Number of disk read operations initiated each second for retrieving data or metadata associated with user requests. plex_disk_user_reads is [disk_user_reads](#disk_user_reads) aggregated by `plex`.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Plexes by User Reads

panels.description: Number of disk write operations initiated each second for storing data or metadata associated with user requests. plex_disk_user_writes is [disk_user_writes](#disk_user_writes) aggregated by `plex`.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Plexes by User Writes

panels.description: Average latency per block in microseconds for user read operations. plex_disk_user_read_latency is [disk_user_read_latency](#disk_user_read_latency) aggregated by `plex`.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Plexes by User Read Latency per 4KB IO

panels.description: Average latency per block in microseconds for user write operations. plex_disk_user_write_latency is [disk_user_write_latency](#disk_user_write_latency) aggregated by `plex`.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Plexes by User Write Latency per 4KB IO

panels.description: Bytes read through a host adapter.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Adapters by Read Data

panels.description: Bytes written through a host adapter.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Adapters by Write Data

panels.description: The average latency of I/O read operations sent from this controller to the indicated target port.
panels.title: Read Latency from FibreBridge/Array WWPN

panels.description: The average read throughput in kilobytes per second read from the indicated target port by the controller.
panels.title: Read Data from FibreBridge/Array WWPN

panels.description: The number of I/O read operations sent from the initiator port to the indicated target port.
panels.title: Read IOPs from FibreBridge/Array WWPN

panels.description: The average latency of I/O write operations sent from this controller to the indicated target port.
panels.title: Write Latency to FibreBridge/Array WWPN

panels.description: The average write throughput in kilobytes per second written to the indicated target port by the controller.
panels.title: Write Data to FibreBridge/Array WWPN

panels.description: The number of I/O write operations sent from the initiator port to the indicated target port.
panels.title: Write IOPs to FibreBridge/Array WWPN

panels.description: This panel shows cluster level diagnostics status detail of Metrocluster.

panels.description: This panel shows node level diagnostics status detail of Metrocluster.
